data.eml:eml: Revision of the genus Hylopachyiulus Attems, 1904, with a description of a new species from Croatia (Diplopoda, Julida, Julidae)

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Antić, Dragan Ž., Rađa, Tonći, Akkari, Nesrine (2018): Revision of the genus Hylopachyiulus Attems, 1904, with a description of a new species from Croatia (Diplopoda, Julida, Julidae). Zootaxa 4531 (2): 225-241, DOI: https://doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4531.2.4
